title: How much acid was Riot on when they made Poro Game Mode?!
body: Legit retarded game mode, I imagine it was a mixture of weed, acid and all other good stuff maybe Teemo mushrooms to make them think that this was a good game mode, or maybe they are just trolling all players having a good laugh at us.

replies.body:
Well, my score on it was just 16/4/20, so perhaps there is quite a bit of blazing involved.
It is like a lot of the temporary gamemodes. URF mode was silly. TT Hexakill was often silly (lol solo Vilemaw while everyone else on my team is dead). So this is silly too. Personally, I am enjoying it but I know I won't play it for much longer and I will just go back to Summoner's Rift.
